title: Multiplex / Multiplex Theatre Complex (MTC) - means a place of public entertainment for the purpose of exhibition of motion pictures with multiple screens and / or dramas and other social or cultural programmes as described in Maharashtra Entertainment Duty Act, 1923
clause_text: Multiplex / Multiplex Theatre Complex (MTC) - means a place of public entertainment for the purpose of exhibition of motion pictures with multiple screens and / or dramas and other social or cultural programmes as described in Maharashtra Entertainment Duty Act, 1923. Net Plot Area - means area of the plot as defined in these regulations.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
